item.title: DevOps, Infrastructure as Code, and PowerShell DSC: The Introduction
item.description: DevOps is the new cool thing (at least in the Windows world) everyone is talking about and the IT professionals (some of us at least) just give a blank stare every time the DevOps discussion comes up.
